definition: small wild or domesticated web-footed broad-billed swimming bird usually having a depressed body and short legs, avoid or try to avoid fulfilling, answering, or performing (duties, questions, or issues)
details:
noun
- small wild or domesticated web-footed broad-billed swimming bird usually having a depressed body and short legs
- a heavy cotton fabric of plain weave
- flesh of a duck (domestic or wild)
- (cricket) a score of nothing by a batsman
= synonyms: duck's egg
- a heavy piece of lead used to keep a drafting spline in place
= example: a heavy piece of lead used to keep a drafting spline in place
verb
- avoid or try to avoid fulfilling, answering, or performing (duties, questions, or issues)
= synonyms: dodge
- to move the head or body quickly downwards or away
= example: to move the head or body quickly downwards or away
- submerge or plunge suddenly
- dip into a liquid
= synonyms: dip
